*div1 type="summary"* *p*Elias R. Wightman to —----, February 18, 1832. Instructions for planting.Elias R. Wightman to —----, February 18, 1832. Instructions for planting.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*I am geting along verry Slowly in my affairs but find Considerable *location_mentioned*land in my Surveys*/location_mentioned* taken, and I have got about $150 in notes since I Came to *location_mentioned*Town */location_mentioned*and there are as much more to Collect and on the *location_mentioned*Sanjacinto */location_mentioned*I am in hopes of geting some and then I shall come *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*without surveying much only finishing some old work*/p*—
*p*If you want more Corn get it of *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Yeaman*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* and tell him I will pay him the Cash when I return— If possible which I expect I can do Forward the Crop, all you can, and take care the pigs— perhaps we shall conclude to Start for *location_mentioned*N York */location_mentioned*via. *location_mentioned*Tampico */location_mentioned*as *person_mentioned*Maria*/person_mentioned*s letter [suggests?] of that more when I come home, If *person_mentioned*Cayce */person_mentioned*got the oxen all will be well, with *person_mentioned*Grassmeyer */person_mentioned*and other matters I can get along with I hope Remember not to burn till a heavy rains falls on the fallow and then a dry time with brisk south wind about 10 c. when the sun is hot and plant immediately after— plant out more potatoes, as soon as may be tell *person_mentioned*Griffith */person_mentioned*I want him to forward his ploughing so as I can have the oxen when I come home O. take care of the potatoes at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*G*/person_mentioned*'s*/location_mentioned* and asort them, burying the good ones again*/p*
*p*Saturday*location_mentioned* San Felipe*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="02-18-1832">18th Feby 1832*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mrs Mary [Wightman?]*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*E R Wightman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Tell *person_mentioned*Alvin */person_mentioned*If he will go to *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*League*/person_mentioned*s */location_mentioned*and get a Colt I have bought— Finally he has no order for him wait till I come*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*ERW*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
